title: Introducing the Soil Health Revolution "Merit or Myth"

tasks.task: Conduct a farm field visit to discuss soil health and sustainable agriculture practices.
subtasks: Introduce yourself and partner as Buzz and Barrett.
Explain the recent shift towards soil health and sustainable farming methods.
Describe the current state of no-till agriculture in South Dakota.
Address the challenges and concerns some farmers have with implementing no-till practices.
Plan to research and address the reasons behind varying success of sustainable practices among farmers.
Utilize various media formats (videos, blogs, podcasts) to share findings and insights.
Collaborate with researchers and experienced farmers to gather information.
Evaluate the validity of concerns and potential myths surrounding sustainable agriculture practices.
